title: Markets, Melvin Capital, And Satellites (Podcast)
itunes:title: Markets, Melvin Capital, And Satellites (Podcast)
description:
Gina Martin Adams, Bloomberg Intelligence Chief Equity Strategist, discusses volatile markets and the economy. Sonali Basak, Bloomberg News Wall Street reporter, discusses Melvin Capital and what's next for hedge funds. David Kudla, Founder, CEO, and Chief Investment Strategist with Mainstay Capital Management, talks about market volatility and the economy in 2022. Peter Platzer, CEO of Spire, talks about satellite tech and his company. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Kriti Gupta.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
